code: @Override @Test public void testQueryMbeans() throws Exception {     // whats the numbers before, because the JVM can have left overs when unit testing     int before = mbsc.queryNames(new ObjectName("org.apache.camel" + ":type=consumers,*"), null).size().     // start route should enlist the consumer to JMX if JMX was enabled     context.getRouteController().startRoute("foo").     int after = mbsc.queryNames(new ObjectName("org.apache.camel" + ":type=consumers,*"), null).size().     assertEquals("Should not have added consumer to JMX", before, after). }
